All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
This class represents an admin user which is a subclass of the User class The admin user is a privileged user with additional functionalities such as the ability to modify user profiles, view system logs, and manage the system.
AdminDashboardController
This is the controller for Admin dashboard.
AdminDeserializer
AdminDeserializer is a custom deserializer for the Admin class.
AdminProfileController
This is the controller for Admin profile.
AdminSerializer
Serializer class for Admin objects.
ApplicationContextManager
 
ApplicationException
This class represents a generic exception that can be thrown within the course of the application
ArcadeBoard
This class represents the game board for the arcade version of the game
Board
This class represents the game board for the traditional version of the game
CmdTest
 
FavoriteProfileCell
Profile Cell represents a custom list cell containing a users to be displayed within a list view
GameController
GameController class represents the controller for the Connect Four game.
GamePlayRecord
This class represents the gameplay record of a player, including the number of wins, losses, and total games played.
Hole
A class representing a hole on the mancala board, which can contain a list of stones.
LeaderboardController
The LeaderboardController class manages the leaderboard screen, which displays a list of players in descending order of their scores.
LeaderboardProfileCell
 
LoginController
The LoginController class is responsible for handling the actions of the login screen, such as attempting to log in the user and redirecting them to the appropriate dashboard.
Main
The driver class for the application contains the start method which launches the application
NotFoundException
This class represents a generic exception that can be thrown whenever a user is not found in the application
Player
This class represents a player which is a subclass of the User class
PlayerApprovalProfileCell
A custom ListCell for displaying and approving player requests in the Player Approval screen.
PlayerDashboardController
PlayerDashboardController is a class that manages click actions on the player dashboard screen
PlayerDeserializer
This class is responsible for deserializing a JSON representation of a player into a Player object.
PlayerProfileController
This is the controller for Player profile.
PlayerSerializer
Serializer class for Player objects.
PowerUp
An enum class representing all possible power ups within the game Power ups are only applicable within arcade mode
Profile
This class represents the complete profile of a user, including info that should not be public
PublicInfo
This class represents the public profile of a user
RegisterController
The RegisterController class is responsible for handling the actions of the register screen, such as attempting to register the user and redirecting them to the appropriate dashboard.
Schema
A class representing the schema for a game, which contains lists of players and admins.
SpecialStone
An enum class representing all possible special stones within the game Special stones are only applicable within arcade mode
StatManager
A utility class which acts as a repository for all game stats within the application This class is a singleton and as such there will ever be one instance of the class within the lifetime of the application
StatSchema
The StatSchema class represents a statistical schema for storing and retrieving game statistics.
StatViewController
Controller for the statistics view screen.
Stone
A class representing a stone on the mancala board.
Store
The Store class represents a container for storing stones in a game.
User
This class represents the base user class for users of the application
UserExistsException
This class represents an exception that is thrown whenever a user try to create an account with an already exiting username
UserRepository
A utility class which acts as a repository for all users within the application This class is a singleton and as such there will ever be one instance of the class within the lifetime of the application
WelcomeController
WelcomeController is a class that manages click actions on the start screen
